description: Family meal times just got easier with this 15-minute, mouth-watering spaghetti.
keywords: Pasta with meatballs,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Pork,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Super Quick Spaghetti & Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium fry pan over high heat. Add meatballs and cook, stirring occasionally, for 6-7 minutes or until well browned. Reduce heat to low, stir through the Napoli sauce and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through.
Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, cook pasta as per packet instructions. Drain, then return to the saucepan and toss through meatballs and sauce.
Toss salad kit together in a large bowl. Divide pasta and meatballs into shallow serving bowls and serve with salad on the side.
